\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	x \& {I_\omega} \&\& R \& r \\
	{(\pi _n (x))_{n \in \omega}} \& {\coprod_{n \in \omega} \frac{I}{I_n} } \&\& {\coprod_{n \in \omega} E(\frac{I}{I_n} )} \& {\varphi (1_R)\cdot r}
	\arrow[maps to, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["i", hook, from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{(\pi)_\bullet}"', hook, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\varphi }"', dashed, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, maps to, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\coprod \iota_n}"', hook, from=2-2, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
